dt.t: The restaurant's chicken dishes are quite {wi}palatable{/wi}.
attempted to make physics {wi}palatable{/wi} to a broader range of students

pt: {sc}palatable{/sc} {sc}appetizing{/sc} {sc}savory{/sc} {sc}tasty{/sc} {sc}toothsome{/sc} mean agreeable or pleasant especially to the sense of taste. {sc}palatable{/sc} often applies to something that is found to be merely agreeable.
{sc}appetizing{/sc} suggests a whetting of the appetite and applies to aroma and appearance as well as taste.
{sc}savory{/sc} applies to both taste and aroma and suggests piquancy and often spiciness.
{sc}toothsome{/sc} stresses the notion of agreeableness and sometimes implies tenderness or daintiness.

shortdef: agreeable to the palate or taste
agreeable or acceptable to the mind
